attributes.action: stop Milton Keynes Council/English Partnerships in closing a section of the V10 in Milton Keynes as one or both of them are in favour of doing this.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We in Milton Keynes have a road grid system that is the envy of tens of thousands of motorists in the uk.Engkish Partnerships are debating to have some builder to block of part of the V10. How utterly stupid can some pepole be there are thousands of acres of land why choose this?
